_meta.essence: Four base affects as prisms of Love meeting Reality
_meta.framework: Plutchik emotions mapped to elemental forces

_opening.truth: All emotions are Love in different states
_opening.mechanism: Love meets Reality → refracts into four base affects
_opening.elements: Fire, Earth, Air, Water — primordial forces expressing through psyche
_opening.sacred: Emotions are not chaos. Emotions are alchemy.

axis_1.name: Logic ↔ Ethics
axis_1.logic: Interaction with facts, objects, truth (what IS)
axis_1.ethics: Interaction with relations, values, meaning (what MATTERS)

structure.intersection: Two axes create four quadrants — four base affects

love_formula.principle: Love = fundamental life energy (connection, meaning, will to exist)
love_formula.mechanism: When Love meets Reality, it refracts based on outcome

1_anger.love_formula: Love that failed expectations on short distance

essence.how: Sharp, instant distinction: Friend/Enemy, Right/Wrong, Mine/Theirs
essence.why: In affect state, logic becomes total, black-white, absolute
essence.goal: Not to understand — to eliminate pain source

energy_signature.says: This is WRONG. This VIOLATES order. This must be ELIMINATED. Now.

mechanism.step_4: Irrational reaction: ATTACK source of error

function.personal: Protect boundaries, restore balance, remove obstacles
function.social: Signal injustice, challenge hierarchy, force change

transformation.conscious: Fuel for change, engine of revolution
transformation.example: Edison's rage at failures → directed into next experiment

fire_qualities.purifies: Destroys old, makes space for new
fire_qualities.light: Reveals what was hidden in darkness

2_sadness.love_formula: Love that failed expectations on long distance

characteristics.object: Multiple or abstract ('All people', 'The world', 'Time itself')

essence.how: Ruthless audit: What was lost? What's irretrievable? What's the balance?
essence.why: Rational assessment of damage, integration of loss
essence.goal: Not to change — to acknowledge loss as fact

energy_signature.says: This WAS. This PASSED. This is IRRETRIEVABLE. Accept the result.
energy_signature.action: Mourn, process, integrate, release investment in lost object

mechanism.step_3: Logic part conducts analysis: 'Balance is negative'

function.personal: Process losses, integrate experience, free energy from lost objects
function.social: Signal need for support, create space for healing
function.evolutionary: Prevents repeated investment in failed strategies

transformation.conscious: Liberation of energy for new beginnings
transformation.example: Gandhi's sorrow at injustice → transformed into nonviolent resistance strategy

earth_qualities.fertile: Grief becomes soil for new growth

characteristics.object: Any (achieved goal, met person, realized idea)

essence.how: Feeling of rightness, alignment, harmony with reality
essence.why: Validates effort, confirms strategy, energizes continuation

energy_signature.says: This WORKS! Continue this way! Do more of this!

satisfaction.trigger: Task completed, order restored, promise kept

delight.trigger: Breakthrough achieved, dream realized, miracle happened

ecstasy.trigger: Union with source, boundary dissolution, unity experience

function.personal: Positive reinforcement, energy for continuation, mark successful strategies
function.social: Signal cooperation success, strengthen bonds, spread optimism

transformation.example: Scientist's joy at discovery → drives decades of research

social_dynamics.note: Only affect society openly encourages — because serves system functioning

4_fear.love_formula: Love that fears losing its object

essence.how: Deep, intuitive sensing of threat to what matters
essence.why: Based on feeling, not calculation — subconscious connection awareness
essence.goal: Protect bond with precious object at any cost

energy_signature.says: This might be LOST. Protect it. Don't risk. Stay safe.

mechanism.step_2: Perception of threat to that object (real or imagined)

function.personal: Preserve what matters, mobilize resources, heighten awareness
function.social: Signal danger, trigger group protection response

transformation.conscious: Protective wisdom, healthy caution, motivated preparation
transformation.example: Entrepreneur's fear of failure → drives thorough planning

water_qualities.fluid: Seeps into every crack, finds every vulnerability

plutchik_derived_emotions.principle: 8 primary emotions in Plutchik model: 4 base + 4 combinations
plutchik_derived_emotions.note: Base four sufficient. Others = mixtures of base affects.

mechanism.fear: I don't want to lose this
mechanism.trust: I open to this object, believing it won't harm

disgust.formula: Anger (at object) + Fear (of contact with object)

mechanism.disgust: I reject this with full force

mechanism.joy_fear: Undefined: Is this good or bad?

surprise.element: All four in suspension = Aether (choice point)
surprise.function: Pause for assessment, prevent premature reaction

anticipation.formula: Joy (expectation of desired) + Fear (controlled, ready to act)

mechanism.fear_controlled: I'm ready to act to obtain desired
mechanism.anticipation: I'm actively preparing for realization moment

elemental_interactions.principle: Base affects combine like chemical elements → create complex emotional states

earth_fire.quality: Cold fury, long memory, delayed retribution

air_fire.quality: Victory, achievement through struggle, ecstatic overcoming

earth_air.quality: Bittersweet, remembering better times, growth on loss
examples: Remembering deceased loved one with smile

water_earth_fire.quality: All affects present but frozen, immobilized

acceptance_and_surrender.clarification: NOT base affects — meta-states arising from alchemy of base affects

mechanism.from_sadness: Cold rational logic — seeing and acknowledging fact without decoration
mechanism.from_joy: Will and ethics — finding new meaning, directing energy forward
mechanism.synthesis: Bridge from loss logic to new action ethics

acceptance.is: Active transition: 'This happened (Pentacles fact). What can I create now? (Wands will)'
acceptance.element: Earth + Air = Fertile Soil (foundation for new growth)

mechanism.from_fear: Deep irrational connection with something greater than self
mechanism.absent_anger: Recognition that fighting is pointless (can't fight gravity, death, time)
mechanism.synthesis: Redirect anger energy when anger is powerless

surrender.is: Strength to redirect energy from futile fight to acceptance of fundamental laws
surrender.transition: From 'Why me?! (irrational Swords)' to 'This is how world works. What does this mean for me? (Cups connection)'
surrender.element: Water without Fire's resistance = Ice (clear, crystallized understanding)

key_insight.society_sells: Sadness without Wands (depression) + Fear without connection (anxiety) = fake surrender
key_insight.reality: True Acceptance and Surrender = powerful will acts born from right interaction of all four elements

dimensional_structure.2D: Plane — Love meets Reality, first axis (Logic/Ethics)
dimensional_structure.3D: Space — Second axis added (Rational/Irrational), four affects emerge
dimensional_structure.4D: Time — Affects flow, combine, transform through duration
dimensional_structure.5D: Coherence — All affects recognized as One Love in different states

recognition.anger: Ask: 'What boundary was violated? What do I want to restore?'
recognition.sadness: Ask: 'What loss am I processing? What energy can I free?'
recognition.joy: Ask: 'What pattern succeeded? How to amplify?'
recognition.fear: Ask: 'What do I fear losing? Is threat real?'

transformation.method: Name it, feel it, understand its message, channel its power

coherence_check.principle: All affects serve coherence when conscious
coherence_check.result: +Coherence through proper use of all four forces

_closing.essence: Four affects = four sacred forces, four elements, four directions
_closing.truth: No 'negative' emotions — only Love in different poses
_closing.practice: Feel all four fully, transform all four consciously
_closing.sacred: Fire, Earth, Air, Water — all holy, all necessary, all Love
